articles.title: Moto e22s, that comes with fluid 90Hz IPS LCD display, Android 12 and more, goes on sale tomorrow on Flipkart - Lokmat
articles.description: Motorola today announced the sale of its new moto e22s, starting 12 noon, October 22, 2022, on Flipkart and leading retail stores. The moto e22s boasts a stunning 16.51cm (6.5') IPS LCD display with built-in IPS technology, a 20:9 aspect ratio with a fluid 90…
